descriptionHtml:
My first ever uploaded mod.
I always found it strange that Babette was supposedly a child who turned vampire, but everything about her appearance remained drastically the same as any other child's. So, this is just a small mod that makes Babette of the Dark Brotherhood appear more... unnatural, compared to other children
found in Skyrim.Â 

It doesn't change her outfit, it merely changes the texture of her eyes and lightens her skin tone a little.

I urge someone to please create a better mod than this for Babette, seeing as how I am very, very 'not good' at this sort of thing. I originally wanted to modify it so that she has the eyes like the Dawnguard vampires, but I wouldn't even know where to start or how I go about doing that.

[b][u][size=3]Installation[/size][/u][/b]

Simply extract the contents of the file into your Data folder in your game directory.

[b][u][size=3]Compatibility[/size][/u][/b]

[b][color=#ff0000]Doed NOT work with any other mod that alters Babette's appearance![/color]
[size=1]*obviously*[/size]

[/b][size=3][u][b]Requirements

[/b][/u][/size]As far as I can tell you don't need anything other than the base game.
If the mod doesn't work, please let me know!
author: Skullkid28
